query: Benny threw bologna at his balloons.  He threw two pieces of bologna at each red balloon and 2265371 pieces of bologna at each yellow balloon.  If Benny threw 58 pieces of bologna at a bundle of red and yellow balloons, and twenty of the balloons were red, then how many of the balloons in the bundle were yellow?

\]  

Since 18 is significantly lower than 2,265,371, Benny cannot have even one complete yellow balloon. Thus, the total number of yellow balloons is 0.
